name: rabble
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large, noisy, uncontrolled group of people: The defeated army returned home as a demoralized rabble. He views his opponents as a mindless rabble. the rabble
people of a low social position: Her speech stirred the emotions of the rabble.
